dict.acceptation: 穿着，戴着；面露；留着（胡须等）；磨损；
耐用；保持不变；磨损，耗损；逐渐或枯燥地通过；
穿着；穿戴物，衣物；磨损，穿旧；耐用性；

sent.orig: The main products including rugby wear, football wear, bicycle wear, badminton wear and tennis wear.
sent.trans: 橄榄球服、自行车骑行服、羽毛球服、网球服、篮球服、足球服等系列。

sent.orig: Wear, Readymade Garments, Ceremonial Dress, Casual Wear and City Wear, High Fashion and Occasional Wear.
sent.trans: 采购产品运动服，成衣，仪式洋装，非正式衣服和城市衣服，上流社会的风尚和非正式衣服。

sent.orig: The main wear mechanisms are oxidation wear, adhesive wear, and abrasive wear.
sent.trans: 主要磨损机制为氧化磨损、粘着磨损和磨粒磨损。

sent.orig: Readymade Garments, Athletic Wear, Casual Wear and City Wear, High Fashion and Wear, Lingerie, Sportswear.
sent.trans: 采购产品成衣，运动装，便服和城市装，时尚装和便服，内衣。

sent.orig: Readymade Garments, Casual Wear and City Wear, High Fashion and Occasional Wear, Lingerie, Specialty.
sent.trans: 采购产品成衣，便服和城市衣服，高级时装和便服，内衣，专门。
